html:
2025-0601
2025-08-07CIRCFirst Nations Fiscal Management ActReappointment of a commissioner of the First Nations Tax CommissionReappointment of Leslie Brochu of Chase, British Columbia, a taxpayer using reserve lands for residential purposes, as a commissioner of the First Nations Tax Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective October 17, 2025.N/A
subject: Reappointment of a commissioner of the First Nations Tax Commission
precis: Reappointment of Leslie Brochu of Chase, British Columbia, a taxpayer using reserve lands for residential purposes, as a commissioner of the First Nations Tax Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective October 17, 2025.
